extensionDescription.message: block all visible likers or retweeters of a tweet.

popup_usageStep1.message: Once you click on a tweet, there is a link which indicates how many people liked this tweet. Click on that link to get the list of all likers.

popup_usageStep2.message: Then click on the new button on the top which says "Block all".

popup_usageStep3.message: All users are being collected. You can chose to block also direct retweeters and then confirm it afterwards.

popup_usageStep4.message: The collected accounts will be added to the blocking queue and will be blocked in background.

popup_options.description: Label or title for options button in popup window.

popup_not_logged_in.description: Info that the user is not logged in.

popup_export.description: Label for the export button in the popup window.

popup_import.description: Label for the import button in the popup window.

popup_donate.message:
Glad that you appreciate our work! ðŸ˜Š
We do this in our free time. This tool is and remains free for everyone and free from ads. Would you consider to donate a little tip?
popup_donate.description: text that encourages the user to donate

popup_reportBug.description: Label for the report bug button

popup_block_speed.description: Label of the block speed display in the popup window.

tweet_text.message: https://twitter.com/share?text=Found a racist or otherwise disgusting tweet and people even like those stuff? @LikersBlocker helps you to get rid of those people within seconds.&url=https://dmstern.github.io/likers-blocker&hashtags=LikersBlocker,sayNoToHateSpeech
tweet_text.description: href for the tweet button. Contains a prefilled tweet text.

ui_blockAll.description: Label for the Block all button

ui_scrollSpeed.message: Want to speed up scrolling? You can adapt the scrolling speed in the settings by clicking on the extension icon in the top right corner of your browser.
ui_scrollSpeed.description: Label for the options button in the collecting window.

ui_usersFound.description: Message how many users have been collected. Gets prefixed the number of collected users.

ui_queue_explanation.message: The users are not blocked yet. To block them, add them to the blocking queue. They will be processed bit by bit in background to not violate the block limit of Twitter.
ui_queue_explanation.description: Explanation text that is displayed after collecting and before adding accounts to queue.

ui_block_explanation.message: Save the .csv file on your computer to share it with others or to use it with multiple accounts.
ui_block_explanation.description: Explanation text that is displayed after collecting and before adding downloading the exported.

ui_collectingUsernames.description: Message that tells the user that the tool is collecting users from a list.

ui_twitterHides.message: Some users may be hidden by Twitter.
ui_twitterHides.description: Message that is shown during or after collecting that tells the user that some users may be hidden.

ui_onlyListItems.message: We can only block users from this list
ui_onlyListItems.description: Message that tells the user, that only accounts that occur in the list can be blocked.

ui_blockRetweeters.description: Label of the checkbox where the user can chose to also block retweeters of the liked tweet.

ui_retweetersHoverHint.message: Only includes direct retweeters without a comment.

ui_download.description: Label of the download button in export view

ui_confirm_title.message: Adds the collected accounts to the blocking queue. These will be blocked bit by bit in background.
ui_confirm_title.description: MouseOver text that will be shown when hovering the confirmation button.

ui_confirm_clicked.message: OK. I'll block them... This will take some time to not to violate Twitter's block limits and risk logout or account suspension. You can find the blocking queue under the extension icon in the top right of your browser window.
ui_confirm_clicked.description: Confirmation message that is shown after user confirmed the queueing of the collected users.

ui_confirm_button_label.description: Button label after user confirmed the queueing of the collected users.

ui_takeAMoment.message: Depending on the number of blocked accounts, this may take a while.
ui_takeAMoment.description: Info that the collection of blocked accounts to export them may take long.

ui_warningHeading.message: Oops! Seems like your UI is hanging.
ui_warningHeading.description: The heading of the warning popup when the UI is hanging.

ui_warningText.message: Maybe you have changed the browser window. Please click OK or scroll with your mouse wheel to continue the user collection process.
ui_warningText.description: The main text of the UI hanging warning which tells the user what to do to continue the scroll process.

ui_doNotShowAgain.description: Button label for do not show again

ui_newRelease.message: You installed the latest LikersBlocker version. ðŸŽ‰ See what's new.

options_import.description: Heading for the import button in the options page.

options_download.description: Label for the import button in the options page.

options_import_success.message: Block list with $count$ users successfully imported. Processing queue...
options_import_success.description: Success message if the import was successful.

options_import_empty.description: Warning message if the imported block list is empty.

options_import_error.message: Error: Wrong file format. Blocklist not imported.
options_import_error.description: Error message if the import failed.

options_include_previously_blocked.message: Include also previously (without LikersBlocker) blocked accounts
options_include_previously_blocked.description: Checkbox label: include previously blocked accounts without LikersBlocker.

options_scroll_speed_hint.message: Scrolling speed when collecting users in (spm = scrolls per minute). The change will apply if you start the collecting process the next time.
options_scroll_speed_hint.description: Hint: Explaining the unit of scroll speed (scrolls per minute)

options_scroll_speed_warning.message: Too fast scrolling could stop the collecting process too early.
options_scroll_speed_warning.description: Warning that too fast scrolling when collecting users may stop the collecting process to early.

options_block_speed_hint.description: Hint: Explaining the unit of block speed (blocks per minute)

options_block_speed_warning.message: Warning: More than $danger$ blocks per minute could cause force-logout or account suspension.
options_block_speed_warning.description: Warning about account suspension or force-logout for block speed values over about 30.

options_clear_hint.message: All user settings, block list, queue will be removed from your browser
options_clear_hint.description: Clear extension data button hover hint
